channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I'm closing comments here to encourage people to leave comments on the Secure Immaturity site.
item.content:encoded: I’m closing comments here to encourage people to leave comments on the Secure Immaturity site.

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: Nice article, Drey. You really made me feel jealous that I wasn't able to particate in the Wild West days of the proto-WWW. I can definitely relate to that feeling of getting a first computer though...
item.content:encoded: Nice article, Drey. You really made me feel jealous that I wasn’t able to particate in the Wild West days of the proto-WWW. I can definitely relate to that feeling of getting a first computer though…
